import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import '../Styles/Tasks.css'; import logo from '../Assets/logo.png'; const Tasks = () => { const [isPopupOpen, setIsPopupOpen] = useState(false); const [selectedTask, setSelectedTask] = useState(null); const tasks = [ { id: 1, name: 'Complete Onboarding Process', briefDescription: 'Finish all onboarding documentation and setup your work environment.', detailedDescription: 'Finish all onboarding documentation and setup your work environment, including configuring your development environment, setting up necessary tools, and ensuring all documentation is completed and submitted.', created: '1 day ago', students: 50, }, { id: 2, name: 'Attend Orientation Meeting', briefDescription: 'Join the orientation meeting to learn about company policies and procedures.', detailedDescription: 'Join the orientation meeting to learn about company policies and procedures, meet your colleagues, and get a detailed overview of what is expected from you during your internship.', created: '2 days ago', students: 50, }, { id: 3, name: 'Team Introduction', briefDescription: 'Introduce yourself to your team and understand your role and responsibilities.', detailedDescription: 'Introduce yourself to your team, learn about their roles and how you will be collaborating with them. Understand your specific responsibilities and how you fit into the team’s goals and objectives.', created: '3 days ago', students: 50, }, { id: 4, name: 'Complete Initial Training', briefDescription: 'Complete the initial training sessions assigned to you.', detailedDescription: 'Complete the initial training sessions assigned to you, which include topics such as company software, development processes, and best practices. These sessions are crucial for your success in your role.', created: '4 days ago', students: 50, }, { id: 5, name: 'Start Working on Assigned Project', briefDescription: 'Begin work on the project assigned by your supervisor.', detailedDescription: 'Begin work on the project assigned by your supervisor, ensuring you understand the project requirements, deadlines, and deliverables. Collaborate with your team to achieve the project goals.', created: '5 days ago', students: 50, }, ]; const handleEnrollClick = (task) => { setSelectedTask(task); setIsPopupOpen(true); }; const closePopup = () => { setIsPopupOpen(false); setSelectedTask(null); }; return (

About Our Company

Welcome to XYZ Corporation! We are thrilled to have you join us as an intern. This section will provide you with the necessary information and instructions to get you started.

During your internship, you will be involved in various tasks and projects that will help you develop your skills and gain valuable experience. Please make sure to complete all the onboarding documentation and set up your work environment.

We have an orientation meeting scheduled where you will learn about our company policies and procedures. It's also a great opportunity to meet your team and understand your role and responsibilities.

); }; export default Tasks;
